00014 //Function from: http://www.evl.uic.edu/aej/594/code/ogl.cpp
00015 //Read in a textfile (GLSL program)
00016 // we need to pass it as a string to the GLSL driver
00017 char *textFileRead(char *fn)
00018 {
00019         FILE *fp;
00020         char *content = NULL;
00021 
00022         int count=0;
00023 
00024         if (fn != NULL) {
00025 
00026                 fp = fopen(fn,"rt");
00027 
00028                 if (fp != NULL) {
00029 
00030                         fseek(fp, 0, SEEK_END);
00031                         count = ftell(fp);
00032                         rewind(fp);
00033 
00034                         if (count > 0) {
00035                                 content = (char *)malloc(sizeof(char) * (count+1));
00036                                 count = fread(content,sizeof(char),count,fp);
00037                                 content[count] = '\0';
00038                         }
00039                         fclose(fp);
00040 
00041                 }
00042         }
00043 
00044         return content;
00045 }
00046 
00047 //Function from: http://www.evl.uic.edu/aej/594/code/ogl.cpp
00048 //Read in a textfile (GLSL program)
00049 // we can use this to write to a text file
00050 int textFileWrite(char *fn, char *s)
00051 {
00052         FILE *fp;
00053         int status = 0;
00054 
00055         if (fn != NULL) {
00056                 fp = fopen(fn,"w");
00057 
00058                 if (fp != NULL) {
00059                         if (fwrite(s,sizeof(char),strlen(s),fp) == strlen(s))
00060                                 status = 1;
00061                         fclose(fp);
00062                 }
00063         }
00064         return(status);
00065 }

00067 //Got this from http://www.lighthouse3d.com/opengl/glsl/index.php?oglinfo
00068 // it prints out shader info (debugging!)
00069 void printShaderInfoLog(GLuint obj)
00070 {
00071         int infologLength = 0;
00072         int charsWritten  = 0;
00073         char *infoLog;
00074         glGetShaderiv(obj, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH,&infologLength);
00075         if (infologLength > 0)
00076         {
00077                 infoLog = (char *)malloc(infologLength);
00078                 glGetShaderInfoLog(obj, infologLength, &charsWritten, infoLog);
00079                 printf("printShaderInfoLog: %s\n",infoLog);
00080                 free(infoLog);
00081         }else{
00082                 printf("Shader Info Log: OK\n");
00083         }
00084 }
00085 
00086 //Got this from http://www.lighthouse3d.com/opengl/glsl/index.php?oglinfo
00087 // it prints out shader info (debugging!)
00088 void printProgramInfoLog(GLuint obj)
00089 {
00090         int infologLength = 0;
00091         int charsWritten  = 0;
00092         char *infoLog;
00093         glGetProgramiv(obj, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH,&infologLength);
00094         if (infologLength > 0)
00095         {
00096                 infoLog = (char *)malloc(infologLength);
00097                 glGetProgramInfoLog(obj, infologLength, &charsWritten, infoLog);
00098                 printf("printProgramInfoLog: %s\n",infoLog);
00099                 free(infoLog);
00100         }else{
00101                 printf("Program Info Log: OK\n");
00102         }
00103 }
